蝃字的基本解释

蝃
dì
古同“螮”。

蝃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dì］
［《廣韻》都計切，去霽，端。］
亦作“螮1”。亦作“1”。
见“蝃蝀”。
[②]［zhuō］
［《廣韻》職悦切，入薛，章。］
见“蝃2蝥”。

蝃字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蝃； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1088第13
【唐韻】同螮。【詩·衞風】蝃蝀在東，莫之敢指。　又職悅切，音拙。蜘蛛也。【爾雅·䵹鼄註】江東呼蝃蝥。　又【集韻】都括切，音掇。義同。

蝃字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蝃字的起名意思

暂无。

rainbow
Basic explanation of words
rainbow
dì
The ancient same "cheater".
rainbow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dì］
["Guangyun" all plan to cut, go to Ji, end. ]
Also known as "Cart 1". Also called "1".
See "蝃蝀".
[②]［zhuō］
["Guang Yun" job Yue cut, enter Xue, chapter. ]
See "蝃2蝥".
rainbow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蝃; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1088-13
[Tang Yun] The same scorpion. 【Poetry·Weifeng】The worm is in the east, so I dare not point it.　Joy again, with clumsy sound. Spiders too. 【Erya·Wai Ku Note】Jiangdong Huxu.　 [Ji Yun] All include cuts, sound 掇. The same meaning.
